Contact Us

About Us

We are a full-service Wealth Management firm with over 20 years of experience at leading financial institutions.

We have been recognized as a Bruin 100 Business with our commitment to continue the UCLA mission of improving our global society.

Wealth Management

We help clients achieve financial goals through tax-efficient, customized investment solutions. Our independence allows us to provide fiduciary advice without the constraints of a single firm's platform.

  • Asset Management
  • Full service, multi-generation financial planning
  • Option trading/hedging strategies
  • Portfolio tax planning
  • Foundation management
  • Designing and managing Estate Planning Trusts (GRATs, CRUTs, CRATs and CLATs)

Private Education

Our firm values education and continuous improvement. We provide private tutoring to individuals and groups looking to enhance their investment and financial acumen. We customize educational tools to accelerate personal growth.

  • Investments
  • Financial Planning
  • Tax Management
  • Options

UCLA

We teach finance at UCLA and lead the Student Investment Fund at UCLA Anderson. Our involvement gives us access to the intellectual capital of UCLA faculty, key alumni, and the leaders of tomorrow.

  • Introduction to Business &
  • Entrepreneurship
  • Personal Financial Health
  • Student Investment Fund (SIF)

Commitment to Education

We live in an ever-changing financial world. Just when we think we understand the game, the rules change. While core principles remain the same, we must adapt as the rules shift. Atala Financial is dedicated to providing the education, tools and guidance needed to solve life’s enduring financial challenges!

We’re in the process of developing our software. Enter your information to get notified when we release our tools.

Team

Shawn Patt

Principal

Shawn is a Certified Private Wealth Advisor® with nearly 20 years of experience, working at RBC Wealth Management, Morgan Stanley & UBS Financial Services.


Shawn is also a professor at The Anderson School of Management at UCLA, teaching Personal Finance. Shawn is also an advisor to the Student Investment Fund at UCLA, helping elite students manage a portion of the UCLA foundation.

Douglas Hanly

MBA, CFA, CAIA, CIO

Douglas is the Chief Investment Officer of Atala. He is also the portfolio manager of Emerald Necklace Investments, an equity hedge fund.


Previously, Doug evaluated investment opportunities on behalf of over $20 billion in aggregate endowment funds. Doug holds an M.B.A. from UCLA, where he generated the highest returns of all time for the Student Investment Fund.

"Atala Financial Inc is a DBA of Magnolia Capital Advisors LLC ("MAG CAP"), an investment adviser registered with the Securities & Exchange Commission. Registration as an investment adviser does not imply a certain level of skill or training. For information pertaining to the registration status of our firm, you may refer to the Investment Adviser Public Disclosure website (www.adviserinfo.sec.gov)."
